definition: Wu Jianren (1867-1910), late Qing dynasty novelist, author of The strange state of the world witnessed over 20 years 二十年目睹之怪現狀|二十年目睹之怪现状
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
callus (patch or hardened skin)/corns (on the feet)

sentences.english: Morals are the main focuses that Wu Jianren's romantic novels pay close attention to.
sentences.chinese: 道德是吳趼人寫情小說關注的主要焦點。

sentences.english: Wu Jianren's romantic novels has acquired great achievement on art.
sentences.chinese: 吳趼人寫情小說的藝術是卓立不凡的。

sentences.english: New story of the stone is an important work of WU Ji an-ren.
sentences.chinese: 《新石頭記》是吳趼人的重要作品。
